document_data.name: Devil's Ego
document_data.Effects: On casting ''devil's ego'', the caster's force of personality was magically enhanced for an extended period of time. Furthermore, this spell turned the caster into an [[outsider]] where spells cast on him or her were concerned. For example, the caster became effectively immune to ''[[charm person]]''. However, the increase in strength of personality did not translate to additional magical power in the form of increased frequency to cast spells, although it made existing spells stronger.
document_data.Components: The casting of ''devil's ego'' required somatic and verbal components.
document_data.History: The only known way to obtain ''devil's ego'' was through the [[Diabolic domain]], a suit of spells that was not granted by all infernal entities.
